# Plots

You can specify the width of a figure:
```{r}
#| out-width: "8cm"
#| echo: false
npk |>
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = N,
      y = P,
      fill = yield
    )
  ) +
  facet_grid(
    cols = vars(K),
    labeller = label_both
  ) +
  geom_tile() +
  coord_equal()
```


Again but smaller
```{r}
#| out-width: "3cm"
#| echo: false
npk |>
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = N,
      y = P,
      fill = yield
    )
  ) +
  facet_grid(
    cols = vars(K),
    labeller = label_both
  ) +
  geom_tile() +
  coord_equal()
```
